jopt.csp.spi.search.actions
Class RestoreSolutionAction

java.lang.Object
  jopt.csp.spi.search.tree.AbstractSearchNodeAction
      jopt.csp.spi.search.actions.RestoreSolutionAction
All Implemented Interfaces:
jopt.csp.search.SearchAction
public class RestoreSolutionAction
extends AbstractSearchNodeAction

This action will apply all changes contained in the solution to variables in the problem. It will not attempt to reset or backtrack to the beginning of the search, but simply reduces the variables in the solution to fit within the parameters given to restore. If you want to want to restore the state of a problem to the exact solution stored, you may want to refer to the CspSolver class's CspSolver.reset() and CspSolver.restoreSolution(SolverSolution) This action is not a replacement of the restore method in the CspSolver class. It is just a convenient way of calling the restore during a search.

Version:
$Revision: 1.6 $
Author:
Nick Coleman
See Also:
StoreSolutionAction, CspSolver.reset(), CspSolver.restoreSolution(SolverSolution)
